email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. The vessel PACIFIC STAR, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m, is available for this route.

Our starting freight quote is USD 25.50 per metric ton. The laycan is set for November 10-15, 2023.

Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 23.50 per metric ton?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the vessel's ETA at Qingdao?

Best regards,
Sophia Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 24.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is USD 18,000 per day, and the vessel's ETA at Qingdao is estimated to be November 25, 2023.

Please let us know if this revised rate works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

The revised rate of USD 24.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we would like to request a laycan adjustment to November 12-17, 2023, to better align with our loading schedule.

Could you confirm if this is feasible?

Best regards,
Sophia Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

We can accommodate the adjusted laycan of November 12-17, 2023. Please confirm your acceptance of the terms so we can proceed with the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Lucas Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

We accept the terms and confirm the laycan of November 12-17, 2023. Please proceed with the documentation, and we look forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Sophia Nguyen
